~~~
+ [[ melodic == \l\u\n\a\r ]]
+ git clone https://github.com/tu-darmstadt-ros-pkg/hector_gazebo -b melodic-devel
Cloning into 'hector_gazebo'...
fatal: Remote branch melodic-devel not found in upstream origin
~~~

I tried using the lunar branch of katana in 5ba04f4, but that didn't work either.
